title: NMOT Movies
description:
NMOT ( New Movies on Torrent ) is the best android app for all movie lovers.
Best features:

- #NMOT tab: Latest movies available on Web. Updated daily. Blockbusters have blue star in top right corner for you to know which movies are the best. Also when you click on the movie you like you are redirected to IMDb where you can see the trailer and all the things you need to know about a movie.

- UPCOMING tab: Gives you all the movies which are going to be released in theaters soon.

- POPULAR tab - Shows the list of the most popular movies at this time. List is shown by Movie Database.

- TOP RATED tab: Shows the list of top rated movies of all time. List is shown by Movie Database.

- All movies in upcoming, popular and top rated tab can be added to favorites and tracked later.

- Watch trailers, summary and cast of a movie.



Also available in Google play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.app.nmot&hl=en



ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:
Requires Android
4.0.3 and up
